channel.title: Getting rid of an item?
channel.description:
Well recently I've found a glitch that involves an item, which I wish to delete from my player's banks.
is there a cmd/command that you can make that deletes the item from there file?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 24, 2009, 08:18:50 pm[/size]

item.title: Getting rid of an item?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

If your player data base isn’t that large…

Just go into their character file and under the Bank part, delete the item ID.

Read full topic
